pr_title: Add IbisDoc for some child elements

timeline.message: Add IbisDoc for some child elements

timeline.bodyText: This description starts with a lower-caps letter. How about starting with a capital to form a sentence?
timeline.author: mhdirkse
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -38,6 +39,7 @@
 	/**
 	 * @param flow New flow to be added to the managed flow elements
 	 */
+	@IbisDoc("flow to be added to the managed flow elements")

replies.bodyText: I do not see a number here, so no order is specified here yet for the XSD. Do you want that the XSD requests the same order here as the order of the methods?
replies.author: mhdirkse

timeline.bodyText: I do not agree with "1" for the order here. We already put some @IbisDoc annotations for sort orders in an earlier pull request. There we use 10, 20, 30 etc, such that we have the option to insert new methods anywhere in the existing sort order.
timeline.author: mhdirkse
